invite.d: Shares an invite for you to add trixy to a server.

levelsystem.d: Enables or disables the leveling system in a guild.

suggest.d: Shares a link to the support server to provide useful feedback.

ping.d: Gets Trixy's API ping and the message endpoint ping.

prune.d: Deletes from 1 to 100 messages in the given chat, as long as it's a server channel.

mute.d: Mutes a member for a given ammount of time in seconds. Mutes without time don't expire.

unmute.d: Unmutes a member. Only for muted members using Trixy.

addrole.d: Adds a role to a member.

removerole.d: Removes a role from a member.

roll.d: Rolls a dice with the given amount of sides, even negatives, because why not!

bird.d: Gets a random image of a bird.

cat.d: Gets a random image of a cat.

cosmos.d: Gets the daily space image from NASA.

dog.d: Gets a random image of a dog.

fox.d: Gets a random image of a fox.

np.d: Shows the currently playing song in the queue.

play.d: Plays a YouTube video or song in a voice channel, only accepts YouTube URLs.

skip.d: Skips the song currently playing in the queue.

stop.d: Clears the queue, similar to `leave`, but without disconnecting.

avatar.d: Gets the avatar of the mentioned user.

remind.d: DMs you a reminder of something after a given amount of time in seconds.

server.d: Gets the properties of a server

user.d: Gets the properties of an user

weather.d: Gets the current weather of a city, powered by [openweather](https://api.openweathermap.org). May be innacurate.

leaderboard.d: Shows the top 10 users by Level and XP points in the guild.

level.d: Gets someones Level and XP points.

leveldelete.d: Erases a member from the guild's level database.
